name: HR Manager (construction and engineering management sector)
description:
Responsibilities:

HR Administration & Payroll

  • Coordination of the data maintenance in paper and in HR systems 1C: ЗУП, SAP HR (operation, recording, creation, maintenance and evaluation of data – performed by outsourcing company)
  • Organization and control of personnel documents archive, document flow
  • Employment policies & rules update
  • Forms, certificates, reference letters for employees
  • If necessary adaptation to national characteristics

Recruiting

  • Tenders
  • Application processes & selection
  • Direct search & communication with recruiting agencies

Onboarding

  • Probation period coordination

Trainings & Development

  • Coordination (scheduling) of T&D processes and events: seminars and workshops (internal and external), professional certification of experts, assessment
  • Coordination of the data maintenance & archive
  • Realization of development discussions
  • Advice for employees, managers and teams
  • Customized solutions/ individual support

Compensations & Benefits

  • Voluntary health insurance: tenders, coordination with brokers and providers, contract management
  • Compensation Policy Review
  • Global motivation system: adaptation & communication
  • Determination of salaries/ within guidelines

Visa & Migration Support

  • Visa invitation letters
  • Work permit & visa: process coordination (performed by outsourcing company)
  • Migration status of foreigners: control, update, prolongation, registration

HR Legal

  • Representation of the Company in authorities (on demand)
  • Employee check by government authorities
  • Consulting for management and employees on Labour Law
  • Managing cases of “escalation”
  • Personal data security

HR Bookkeeping

  • Providers: contracts, invoices, reports

Controlling

  • Personnel Cost Planning (quarterly)
  • Data collecting for business planning
  • Reports, statistics, benchmarks (on request by management)
  • Consultation of the management based on HR data (KPI´s)
  • Derivation and implementation of measures for the OU

HR Marketing

  • Operational HR Marketing (fairs, teaching assignments etc., team building, etc.)
Requirement:​​​​​​​
  • higher education
  • experience in a similar position – at least 3 years
  • Experience with 1С:ЗУП and SAP HR
  • English language – Upper-Intermediate or higher
  • High level of personal responsibility
  • Able to work with a high degree of independence
  • Attention to detail and strong follow through; able to establish priorities and manage multiple tasks simultaneously
  • Outstanding communication skills that work with partners with different communication styles
  • A team player
  • Ready to be personally hands-on across all tasks, including administrative work
  • High degree of personal integrity
  • Already experienced as a “stand alone” HR Manager or ready professionally take the step up into a role with this level of responsibility
  • Ideally experienced working with engineering, construction or project management companies

Conditions:

  • International company with a great corporate culture
  • office close to the Moscow center near the metro
  • unlimited labour contract
  • probation period - 3 months
  • voluntary health insurance after probation period
  • corporate mobile phone
  • 100% compensation of sickness leave after the 1st year of work (up to 14 calendar days per year)
